sentences.english: Second, conduct strict quality control on materials needed for the rebuilding of the earthquake-stricken area.

sentences.english: All work in India was to be done by architects imported from Britain.

sentences.english: All the products are subject to multiple strict quality checks and ran-dom sample tests.
